pkgmetadata.longdescription: Toolkit for High Energy Physics Event Generation. ThePEG has been broken out from the PYTHIA7 program to better factorize the parts which were PYTHIA-specific from those which are general model-independent components of the toolkit and which can be used by any event generator model.

use.flag: Build ThePEG using the C++11 standard. Experimental feature, not for production use.
Adds support for High Energy Physics Monte Carlo Generators sci-physics/hepmc
